home.addTasks: Add some tasks to your catalog to get started.
home.selectLevel: Select an energy level to find your next step.

empty.quietSubtitle: Add tasks you want to tackle later when you have the energy.

victory.title: You've completed your quest!
victory.subtitle: Enjoy your rest.
victory.description: You've cleared your path. There are no more tasks waiting for your attention.
victory.nextTasks: Your next set of tasks will be ready in {{count}} day.
victory.nextTasks_other: Your next set of tasks will be ready in {{count}} days.
victory.comeBack: Come back then for new challenges!

swipe.a11yRemove: Press Delete or Backspace to remove.

exhausted.title: You've seen all tasks for this level.
exhausted.subtitle: What would you like to do?

low.title: Level Cleared
low.message: A steady ripple leads to a calm sea. You're finding your rhythm.

medium.title: Incredible Progress
medium.message: You tackled the core of your day with grace. You're truly in the flow now.

high.title: Absolute Powerhouse
high.message: You've conquered the heavy lifting. The mountain is behind you. Time for a well-deserved rest.

encouragements: Take a deep breath. You've got this.
One step at a time is all it takes.
Progress is progress, no matter how small.
Focus on the now. The rest can wait.
You are capable of more than you think.
Slow and steady wins the race.
Be kind to yourself as you move forward.
The mountain is climbed one pebble at a time.
Start where you are. Use what you have.
Quiet your mind and focus on the task at hand.
Each small action builds a better tomorrow.

report.addTasks: Add some tasks to see your energy breakdown.
report.checkOff: Check off some tasks to see your progress!

import.tooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 1MB.
import.invalidFormat: Invalid CSV format. Required headers: title, effort, interval, unit
import.failed: Import failed. An unexpected error occurred while processing.

export.failed: Export failed. An unexpected error occurred.
